Package player

Class Summary
AsynchronousPlayer A player that naturally communicates in an ansynchronous manner, if asked for the next move.
ComputerPlayer Represents the local computer player using the available strategy for generating moves.
ConsolePlayer Represents a player that connects to the local server by utilizing a service that is acting as client and which is provided by the local server to manage the communication between local game and player.
HumanPlayer Provides a basic implementation for the human player.
Player Abstract class for encapsulating player logic.
RemotePlayer A player that represents the remote server, therefore utilizing a local client that connects the local game with the remote server.
SynchronousPlayer A player who communicates in a synchronous manner if asked for the next move.
